trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_000_001<tab>Hello, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>! <var 2B ((<var 28 ((TripleTriadCompetition)) E80301 /var>)) /var> is currently underway! Place in the top three, and you'll take home <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var>!

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_000_002<tab>Hello, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>! Looking to enter a Triple Triad tournament? I...oh. I'm afraid our records show that you've yet to take the required tutorial.

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_000_003<tab>If you'd like to participate in tournaments, please speak with the Triple Triad master and she will gladly walk you through the basic rules of the game!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_Q1_000_001<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_A1_000_001<tab>Enter the current tournament.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_A1_000_002<tab>View current tournament rankings.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_A1_000_006<tab>Ask about tournament rankings.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_A1_000_003<tab>Ask about tournament prizes.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_A1_000_004<tab>Ask about tournament rules.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_A1_000_005<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_010_001<tab>Shall I sign you up for <var 28 ((TripleTriadCompetition)) E80201 /var>?
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_Q2_000_001<tab>Enter <var 28 ((TripleTriadCompetition)) E80201 /var>?
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_A2_000_001<tab>Yes
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_A2_000_002<tab>No

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_011_001<tab>There we are, <var 29 EB02 /var>! You are now officially registered for <var 28 ((TripleTriadCompetition)) E80201 /var>. Best of luck in the tournament!

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_011_002<tab>Matches for <var 28 ((TripleTriadCompetition)) E80201 /var> will be held from <var 07 E803 /var><var 08 E4E94E04 ((<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) ((<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) /var> - <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var>:00 <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (<var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var>) to <var 07 E804 /var><var 08 E4E94E04 ((<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) ((<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) /var> - <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var>:00 <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (<var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var>).

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_011_103<tab>Looking to test your skills against a full field of worthy opponents? Head to the Triple Triad Battlehall and sign up for a tournament! It is as simple as speaking to one of the hall attendants, and stating your desire to enter.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_011_004<tab>Note that after participating in a tournament, you will be escorted back to Card Square while your ranking is tabulated.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_011_005<tab>Furthermore, you will also be escorted out of the Battlehall once it reaches fifteen minutes before the end of the tournament period.

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_011_003<tab>Once the competition is over, speak with the tournament recordkeeper as soon as possible to claim your winnings. A new competition will begin one week after the current tournament ends, and all unclaimed prizes will be forfeit at this time.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_020_001<tab>These are the current rankings for <var 28 ((TripleTriadCompetition)) E80201 /var>.

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_020_002<tab>If you are curious where you stand in the ever-heated struggle for first place, you can check your current ranking at any time simply by observing the ranking board in Card Square.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_030_000<tab>Tournament prizes vary from contest to contest, so different winnings will be earned from the Spinner's Pull as opposed to, say, the Durai Memorial.

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_030_001<tab>Entrants who claim first, second, or third place in <var 28 ((TripleTriadCompetition)) E80301 /var> will be awarded <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var>!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_030_101<tab>These top-ranking players will also be awarded a number of MGP, with first place earning a grand prize of <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> points!

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_030_002<tab>Entrants who place from fourth to sixth in the rankings will be awarded <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var>, as well as a number of MGP dependent on their rank.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_030_007<tab>Entrants who place from seventh to tenth will be awarded <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var>, as well as─again─a number of MGP based upon their rank.

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_030_003<tab>Those who rank eleventh through twentieth will be awarded <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var>, as well as─stop me if you've heard this one─a set amount of MGP based upon their rank.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_030_004<tab>Lastly, those who fail to place in the top twenty will receive a participation gift of <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> MGP.

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_030_005<tab>In addition to these rewards, entrants will receive a bonus amount of MGP based on the number of points they have earned at the conclusion of the tournament.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_030_006<tab>Entrants who earn enough points will also be awarded a bonus <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020202 /var>, so get that tournament score as high as you can!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_040_001<tab>Triple Triad tournaments are some of the most enthralling and popular events to be held at the Manderville Gold Saucer!

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_040_002<tab>Once you've entered a tournament, you will be able to play tournament matches against your fellow adventurers in a battle to become the top-ranked player.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_040_003<tab>But it won't be easy─the Gold Saucer's champions found here in the Triple Triad Battlehall will also take part in the competition!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_040_004<tab>You should also know that each tournament title has a fixed set of advanced rules that tournament matches must follow!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_040_005<tab>Every tournament match you play will count towards your final score. This score will increase for every match you win.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_040_006<tab>Oh, and you can only play a set number of matches per tournament, so be sure to make every battle count!

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_040_007<tab><var 08 E4E80201 ((I will be happy to provide you with the current rankings at any time during the tournament. The board here beside me will also display the ongoing struggle for first place!)) ((You may check where you stand at any time by observing the ranking board in Card Square.)) /var>
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_040_008<tab>Scores will be locked the moment the tournament ends, and these numbers will determine your final ranking.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_040_009<tab>Aim to place in the top three and you might just win yourself a rare card!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_040_010<tab>Participants will be awarded bonus MGP and bonus <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020302 /var> based on the number of tournament points they have earned.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_040_011<tab>The more points you earn, the better the bonus you receive, so try to push your score as high as possible before the tournament comes to a close!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_140_006<tab>When two or more players share the same score at the end of a tournament, rank is then determined by the greatest number of wins.

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_240_006<tab>If wins are also equal, then rank will be decided by the least number of matches played. Should match numbers also be equal, then the higher rank will go to the participant who first recorded a result on the tournament ranking board.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_100_001<tab><var 2B ((<var 28 ((TripleTriadCompetition)) E80201 /var>)) /var> has come to a close! Let's have a look at the final rankings, shall we?
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_110_001<tab>Congratulations, <var 29 EB02 /var>! I see your name right there at number <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var>!

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_110_002<tab>I am pleased to award you <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var>! And after adding in your point bonus, your total prize winnings come to <var 22 E803 ((,)) /var> MGP!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_110_003<tab>With the addition of your point bonus, I am pleased to award you the sum of <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> MGP!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_110_010<tab>Your impressive performance has also earned you <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var>!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_Q3_000_001<tab>Accept your prize?
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_A3_000_001<tab>Yes
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_A3_000_002<tab>No
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_110_004<tab>Thank you for entering, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, and I hope to see you return for our next Triple Triad tournament!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_120_001<tab>...Ah, I'm afraid you didn't quite earn a winning rank this time around.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_120_002<tab>You are, however, eligible to receive a participation gift of <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> MGP...which includes a bonus for your high tournament score!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_120_005<tab>You are, however, eligible to receive a participation gift of <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> MGP!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_120_010<tab>Your impressive performance has also earned you <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var>!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_130_001<tab>Congratulations on a hard-fought tourney! Should you wish to review the final standings, you may do so at Card Square.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_200_001<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>! Are you looking to enter a Triple Triad tournament? I would be happy to assist in any way I can!
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_Q4_000_001<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_A4_000_001<tab>Ask about the upcoming tournament.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_A4_000_002<tab>Ask about tournament rules.
TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_A4_000_003<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_TTCUP_210_001<tab>Our next Triple Triad tournament will be <var 28 ((TripleTriadCompetition)) E80301 /var>! Only the best players will earn themselves <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var>, so have your strongest decks ready!

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADCUP_00247_SYSTEM_210_002<tab>Entries for <var 28 ((TripleTriadCompetition)) E80201 /var> will be accepted from <var 07 E803 /var><var 08 E4E94E04 ((<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) ((<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) /var> - <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var>:00 <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (<var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var>) to <var 07 E804 /var><var 08 E4E94E04 ((<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) ((<var 20 DE /var>/<var 20 DC /var>/<var 20 DF /var>)) /var> - <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var>:00 <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (<var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var>).
